DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether specialty care superior usual care treatment patient clinical high risk psychosis .
DOC.brief_title: PRIME v Usual Care Clinical High Risk
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize clinical effectiveness trial patient clinical high risk psychosis compare two treatment : 1 ) specialty care deliver specialized clinical patient clinical high risk psychosis versus 2 ) treatment usual community .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet following : 1 . Male female 12 30 year old . 2 . Understand sign inform consent ( assent minor ) document English . 3 . Meet diagnostic criterion prodromal syndrome per COPS criterion . Subjects must meet following : 1 . Diagnosis current lifetime Axis I psychotic disorder , include mood disorder psychotic symptom . 2 . Impaired intellectual functioning ( fullscale IQ < 70 ) . However , IQ 6569 range exclude score > 75 WRAT Reading . 3 . Past current history clinically significant central nervous system disorder may contribute prodromal symptom confound assessment . 4 . Alcohol substance dependence past 6 month .
